query_1.text: Who was Napoleon Bonaparte and what were his significant contributions to European history?

query_2.text: What events led to Napoleon Bonaparte becoming the Emperor of the French?

query_3.text: When did Napoleon Bonaparte rise to power, and what key battles marked his military campaigns?

query_4.text: Where did Napoleon Bonaparte conduct most of his military campaigns, and what territories did he conquer?

query_5.text: Why did Napoleon Bonaparte's rule ultimately come to an end, leading to his exile?

query_6.text: How did Napoleon Bonaparte influence legal systems in Europe through the Napoleonic Code?
